description: Two albums from a Jersey pop-folk band are added to the UK's audio and cultural archive.
title: Jersey Jerriais music joins British Library archive
title_page: Jersey Jerriais music joins British Library archive - BBC News
maintext: "The value and beauty of Jerriais has been oppressed and hidden for too long and it's up to us all now to change that story and make sure that it's around for generations to come," he said.
